title: Honours
body:
Did everyone have their honours reset, or just a few random people riot hates?

1/2 my friend list has theirs reset, and 1/2 doesnt

replies.body: I have close to 100 now and haven't got a ribbon? What's the deal.. When the system first came out I got one, but lost it and I don't know why?
I had around 800+ of all but mentor. they were all reset and idk why, neither do my friends, I also lost my mini red/green banner that was always with me

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YxIZfkEw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-29T12:30:50.261+0000)
>
> I had around 800+ of all but mentor. they were all reset and idk why, neither do my friends, I also lost my mini red/green banner that was always with me

If you get banned they clear.
Hmm, wonder when 1/2 of my list got banned
800+.....lol i bet its cos rito found out you and your m8s were honouring each other scumbag hahahaha
